TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeflateStream extends System.IO.Stream

Docs.summary: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类表示 Deflate 算法，它是一种用于无损文件压缩和解压缩的行业标准算法。 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类使用 zlib 库。 因此，它提供了更好的压缩算法，在大多数情况下，它比在早期版本的 .NET Framework 中提供的压缩文件更小。
此类本质上不提供将文件添加到 zip 存档或从 zip 存档中提取文件的功能。 若要使用 zip 存档，请使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive> 和 <xref:System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry> 类。
<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类使用与 <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream> 类使用的 gzip 数据格式相同的压缩算法。
<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 和 <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream> 中的压缩功能作为流公开。 数据逐字节读取，因此不能执行多个传递来确定压缩整个文件或大型数据块的最佳方法。 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 和 <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream> 类最适用于未压缩的数据源。 如果源数据已压缩，使用这些类实际上可能会增加流的大小。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类压缩和解压缩文件的目录。
[!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类压缩大于 4 GB 的文件将导致异常。

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel) cil managed
public: DeflateStream(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel);
new System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream : System.IO.Stream * System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel -> System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream

Docs.param: The stream to compress.
One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression efficiency when compressing the stream.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression level.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当您想要指定压缩效率或速度对于 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类的实例是否更重要时，可以使用此构造函数。
此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 <xref:System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode.Compress>。 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionMode%29> 或 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 重载。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 对象时设置压缩级别。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: is .
The stream does not support write operations such as compression. (The property on the stream object is .)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The stream to compress or decompress.
One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 默认情况下，<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 拥有基础流，因此关闭流也会关闭基础流。 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响流的可用性。 此外，不执行显式检查，因此在创建新实例时不会引发其他异常。
如果创建的 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类的实例的 `mode` 参数等于 `Compress`，则会立即插入标头信息。 如果没有进一步的操作，流将显示为有效的、空的压缩文件。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类压缩大于 4 GB 的文件会引发异常。
默认情况下，在 <xref:System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode.Compress>压缩模式时，压缩级别设置为 <xref:System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel.Optimal>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类压缩和解压缩文件。
[!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要指定压缩效率或速度对于 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类的实例是否更重要，以及在释放 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 对象后是否将流对象保持打开状态，请使用此构造函数。
此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 <xref:System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode.Compress>。 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionMode%29> 或 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.IO.Compression.CompressionMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 重载。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 对象时设置压缩级别，以及如何使流保持打开状态。
[!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

## Remarks 默认情况下，<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 拥有基础流，因此关闭流也会关闭基础流。 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响流的可用性。 此外，不执行显式检查，因此在创建新实例时不会引发其他异常。
如果创建的 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类的实例的 `mode` 参数等于 `Compress`，则会立即插入标头信息。 如果没有进一步的操作，流将显示为有效的、空的压缩文件。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类压缩大于 4 GB 的文件会引发异常。
默认情况下，在 <xref:System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode.Compress>压缩模式时，压缩级别设置为 <xref:System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel.Optimal>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 类压缩和解压缩文件。
[!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function BeginRead (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer, cback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult

override this.BeginRead : byte[] * int * int * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The byte array to read the data into.
The byte array to read the data into.
The byte offset in at which to begin reading data from the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read operation is complete.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read operation is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous read operation. (Consider using the method instead.)
Docs.returns: An object that represents the asynchronous read operation, which could still be pending.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，你可以通过使用 <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A> 方法执行异步读取操作。 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginRead%2A> 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。
将 <xref:System.IAsyncResult> 返回值传递到流的 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndRead%2A> 方法，以确定读取的字节数，以及释放用于读取的操作系统资源。 为此，可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginRead%2A> 调用的相同代码，也可以在传递给 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginRead%2A>的回调中执行此操作。
发出异步读取或写入操作时，将更新流中的当前位置，而不是在 i/o 操作完成时进行更新。
多个同时进行的异步请求会导致不确定请求完成顺序。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanRead%2A> 属性来确定当前 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 对象是否支持读取。
如果流已关闭或传递的参数无效，则会立即从 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginRead%2A>引发异常。 在异步读取请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）会在线程池线程上发生，并在调用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndRead%2A>时引发异常。

Docs.exception: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The current implementation does not support the read operation.
This call cannot be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override IAsyncResult BeginWrite (byte[] array, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginWrite(unsigned int8[] array, int32 offset, int32 count, class System.AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState) cil managed
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginWrite(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ array, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ asyncCallback, System::Object ^ asyncState);
override this.BeginWrite : byte[] * int * int * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult
public override IAsyncResult BeginWrite (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback cback, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginWrite(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, class System.AsyncCallback cback, object state) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BeginWrite (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer, cback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginWrite(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ cback, System::Object ^ state);
override this.BeginWrite : byte[] * int * int * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The buffer to write data from.
The buffer to write data from.
The byte offset in to begin writing from.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write operation is complete.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write operation is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous write operation. (Consider using the method instead.)
Docs.returns: An object that represents the asynchronous write operation, which could still be pending.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以通过使用 <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A> 方法执行异步写入操作。 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginWrite%2A> 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。
将当前方法返回的 <xref:System.IAsyncResult> 对象传递到 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A>，以确保写入完成并适当地释放资源。 为此，可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginWrite%2A> 调用的相同代码，也可以在传递给 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginWrite%2A>的回调中执行此操作。 如果在异步写入操作过程中发生错误，则在使用此方法返回的 <xref:System.IAsyncResult> 调用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A> 之前，将不会引发异常。
如果流可写，则在流的末尾写入会扩展流。
发出异步读取或写入操作时，将更新流中的当前位置，而不是在 i/o 操作完成时进行更新。 多个同时进行的异步请求会导致不确定请求完成顺序。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanWrite%2A> 属性来确定当前 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 对象是否支持写入。
如果流已关闭或传递的参数无效，则会立即从 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginWrite%2A>引发异常。 在异步写入请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）会在线程池线程上发生，并在调用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A>时引发异常。

Docs.exception: The method tried to write asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The current implementation does not support the write operation.
The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void CopyTo (System.IO.Stream destination, int bufferSize);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.IO.Stream destination, int32 bufferSize) cil managed

override this.CopyTo : System.IO.Stream * int -> unit

Docs.param: The stream to which the contents of the current Deflate stream will be copied.
The size of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero. The default size is 81920.
Docs.summary: Reads the bytes from the current Deflate stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
复制从当前 Deflate 流中的当前位置开始，复制操作完成后，不会重置目标流的位置。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync (System.IO.Stream destination, int bufferSize, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync(class System.IO.Stream destination, int32 bufferSize, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ CopyToAsync(System::IO::Stream ^ destination, int bufferSize, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.CopyToAsync : System.IO.Stream * int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The stream to which the contents of the current Deflate stream will be copied.
The size, in bytes, of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero. The default size is 81920.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current Deflate stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
利用 `CopyToAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。
如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 值。
复制从当前 Deflate 流中的当前位置开始。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法由 public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 方法和 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法调用。 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 调用受保护的 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.Dispose%2A> 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.Dispose%2A>。
当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。 此方法调用每个引用对象的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 方法。

block.para:
可以由其他对象多次调用。 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。
有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask DisposeAsync ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask DisposeAsync() cil managed
Public Overrides Function DisposeAsync () As ValueTask
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::ValueTask DisposeAsync();
override this.DisposeAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask

Docs.summary: Asynchronously releases the unmanaged resources used by the .
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous dispose operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
使用 `DisposeAsync` 方法，您可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的释放操作。 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。
此方法通过将任何更改写入后备存储并关闭流以释放资源来释放 Deflate 流。
调用 `DisposeAsync` 允许出于其他目的重新分配 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> 所使用的资源。 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int EndRead (IAsyncResult asyncResult);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 EndRead(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EndRead (asyncResult As IAsyncResult) As Integer
public: override int EndRead(IAsyncResult ^ asyncResult);
override this.EndRead : IAsyncResult -> int
public override int EndRead (IAsyncResult async_result);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 EndRead(class System.IAsyncResult async_result) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EndRead (async_result As IAsyncResult) As Integer
public: override int EndRead(IAsyncResult ^ async_result);
override this.EndRead : IAsyncResult -> int

Docs.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
Docs.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous read to complete. (Consider using the method instead.)
Docs.returns: The number of bytes read from the stream, between 0 (zero) and the number of bytes you requested. returns 0 only at the end of the stream; otherwise, it blocks until at least one byte is available.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，你可以通过使用 <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A> 方法执行异步读取操作。 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndRead%2A> 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。
调用此方法以确定从流中读取的字节数。 可以调用此方法一次，以返回对 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginRead%2A> 和 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndRead%2A>的调用之间的读取字节量。
此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。

Docs.exception: is .
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
An exception was thrown during a call to .

The end call is invalid because asynchronous read operations for this stream are not yet complete.
-or-
The stream is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void EndWrite (IAsyncResult asyncResult);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndWrite(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub EndWrite (asyncResult As IAsyncResult)
public: override void EndWrite(IAsyncResult ^ asyncResult);

override this.EndWrite : IAsyncResult -> unit

Docs.param: A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.
A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.
Docs.summary: Ends an asynchronous write operation. (Consider using the method instead.)

remarks.format:
## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]开始，可以通过使用 <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A> 方法执行异步写入操作。 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A> 方法仍在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中可用以支持旧版代码;不过，您可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。
对于每次调用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.BeginWrite%2A> 方法，只需调用一次 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A>。
此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。 在异步写入请求期间发生的错误（例如，i/o 请求过程中的磁盘故障）将在线程池线程上发生，并在调用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A>时变为可见。 调用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.EndWrite%2A>时，线程池线程引发的异常将不可见。

Docs.exception: is .
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
An exception was thrown during a call to .

The stream is .
-or-
The end write call is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的当前实现不会刷新内部缓冲区。 释放对象时，将刷新内部缓冲区。

Docs.exception: The stream is closed.

Docs.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this Deflate stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 值。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (Span<byte> buffer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> buffer) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Span(Of Byte)) As Integer
public: override int Read(Span<System::Byte> buffer);
override this.Read : Span<byte> -> int

Docs.param: A region of memory. When this method returns, the contents of this region are replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
Docs.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream into a byte span and advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read.
Docs.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanRead%2A> 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。 使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.ReadAsync%2A> 方法从当前流中异步读取。
此方法从当前流中读取最多 `buffer.Length` 个字节，并将它们存储在 `buffer`中。 Deflate 流中的当前位置由读取的字节数提前，但是，如果发生异常，则 Deflate 流中的当前位置将保持不变。 如果没有数据可用，则此方法将被阻止，直到至少有一个字节的数据可供读取。 仅当流中没有更多的数据，并且不需要更多的数据时（例如闭合套接字或文件尾），`Read` 才返回0。 即使尚未到达流的末尾，方法也可以随意返回比所请求的字节更少的字节。
使用 <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> 读取基元数据类型。

public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ array, int offset, int count);
override this.Read : byte[] * int * int -> int

The byte offset in at which the read bytes will be placed.
The maximum number of decompressed bytes to read.
Docs.summary: Reads a number of decompressed bytes into the specified byte array.
Docs.returns: The number of bytes that were read into the byte array.

[!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

The value was when the object was created.
-or- The underlying stream does not support reading.

or is less than zero.
-or- length minus the index starting point is less than .
The data is in an invalid format.
The stream is closed.

Docs.param: The region of memory to write the data into.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream, writes them to a byte memory range, advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, which wraps the total number of bytes read into the buffer. The result value can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the Deflate stream has been reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
利用 `ReadAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanRead%2A> 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。
如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 值。

Docs.param: The buffer to write the data into.
The byte offset in at which to begin writing data from the Deflate stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current Deflate stream, writes them to a byte array, advances the position within the Deflate stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, which wraps the total number of bytes read into the . The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the Deflate stream has been reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
利用 `ReadAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanRead%2A> 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。
如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 值。

Docs.param: A region of memory. This method copies the contents of this region to the current Deflate stream.
Docs.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current Deflate stream and advances the current position within this Deflate stream by the number of bytes written.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanWrite%2A> 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。 使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.WriteAsync%2A> 方法异步写入当前流。
如果写入操作成功，Deflate 流中的位置将按写入的字节数向前移动。 如果发生异常，则 Deflate 流中的位置将保持不变。

## Remarks
利用 `WriteAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanWrite%2A> 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。
如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
利用 `WriteAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。
使用 <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream.CanWrite%2A> 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。
如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性的 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled?displayProperty=nameWithType> 值。
